
{{alias}}( x, μ )
    Evaluates the logarithm of the probability density function (PDF) for a
    degenerate distribution with a point mass at `μ`.

    If provided `NaN` as any argument, the function returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    μ: number
        Constant value of distribution.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Evaluated logPDF.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 2.0, 3.0 )
    -infinity
    > y = {{alias}}( 3.0, 3.0 )
    infinity
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN, 0.0 )
    NaN
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.0, NaN )
    NaN


{{alias}}.factory( μ )
    Returns a function for evaluating the logarithm of the probability density
    function (PDF) of a degenerate distribution centered at a provided mean
    value.

    Parameters
    ----------
    μ: number
        Constant value of distribution.

    Returns
    -------
    logpdf: Function
        Logarithm of probability density function (PDF).

    Examples
    --------
    > var mylogPDF = {{alias}}.factory( 10.0 );
    > var y = mylogPDF( 10.0 )
    infinity

    See Also
    --------
